posts.post_content:
Posted By: Andrew
With great pain I need to sell these cards to pay some bills at this time. There are three card The T206 willis is a soid 5 but it is off centered. The T201 Johnson is in good condition I would say a 2 just for having some glue on the back.The T202 Johnson is very good at a 3 Small creases on both the head shots,the back is great. I am selling these as a group for $525.Having a hard time posting the pics so email me and I will send you the pics. Thanks for your time.

    Andrew
